mapper.select: select count(*) as visitCount, TO_CHAR(LAST_ACCESS_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regadte from today where LAST_ACCESS_DATE >= SYSDATE-15 group by TO_CHAR(LAST_ACCESS_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) as visitCount, TO_CHAR(LAST_ACCESS_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') as regadte from today where TO_CHAR(LAST_ACCESS_DATE, 'yyyy') = '2022' group by TO_CHAR(LAST_ACCESS_DATE, 'yyyy-MM')
select count(*) as joinCount, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as startDate from Users where START_DATE >= SYSDATE-15 and USER_CODE = 1 group by TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) as joinCount, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') as startDate from Users where TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy') = '2022' and USER_CODE = 1 group by TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM')

select a.joinCount, a.startDate, sum(a.joinCount) over(order by a.joinCount) as sum from ( select count(*) as joinCount, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as startDate from Users where START_DATE >= SYSDATE-15 and USER_CODE = 1 group by TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') )a

select a.joinCount, a.startDate, sum(a.joinCount) over(order by a.joinCount) as sum from ( select count(*) as joinCount, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') as startDate from Users where TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy') = '2022' and USER_CODE = 1 group by TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') )a

select sum(pay_price) as sum, TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'yyyy-MM') as paymentDate, TO_CHAR(a.payment_date, 'MM') as month
, b.officeNo as officeNo, b.officeName as officeName
from payment_detail a join adminOrderListView b on a.order_no = b.orderNo where TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'yyyy') = '2022'
and officeNo = #{officeNo}
group by TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'yyyy-MM'), TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'MM')
, officeNo, officeName
select categoryNo, sum(quan) from adminCharCategoryView group by categoryNo
